trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **NavigationFailed** event.
trans-unit.target: Fournit des données pour l’événement **NavigationFailed**.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments contain information about a navigation that failed, and are passed to handlers of the **NavigationFailed** event, which is implemented by the following:
trans-unit.target: Ces arguments d’événement contiennent des informations sur une barre de navigation qui a échoué et est passé aux gestionnaires de la **NavigationFailed** événement, qui est implémentée par les éléments suivants :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> encapsulates the following details of the failed navigation request:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> encapsule les détails suivants de la requête de navigation a échoué :

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Initiation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Navigator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Initiation de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Navigator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Exception**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Exception%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Exception de navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Exception%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Content**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Uri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Contenu de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Uri%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Details**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Détails de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **État de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'<see cref="T:System.Exception" /> levée découlant de l'échec d'une navigation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> levée découlant de l'échec d'une navigation.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Exception> will be either a <xref:System.Net.WebException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception> correspond à un <xref:System.Net.WebException> ou un <xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation commenced.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'<see cref="T:System.Object" /> facultatif de données passé lorsque la navigation a commencé.

trans-unit.source: The optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation commenced.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> facultatif de données passé lorsque la navigation a commencé.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> peut être utilisé pour passer des données spécifiques au contexte qui sont spécifiques à une navigation particulière.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contient une référence à l’objet qui est passé comme deuxième argument lors de l’appel soit <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, il s'agit de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit si l'exception levée par l'échec de la navigation a été gérée.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> (default).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si l'exception est gérée ; <see langword="false" /> (valeur par défaut) dans le cas contraire.

trans-unit.source: When you handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> to process an exception that is thrown as a result of a failed navigation, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing the exception, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous gérez <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> au processus, une exception est levée à la suite d’un échec de la navigation et que vous ne souhaitez pas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] pour continuer le traitement de l’exception, vous devez définir le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriété `true`.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: Navigateur qui a déclenché l'événement.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the navigator that raised this event
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> correspondant au navigateur qui a déclenché cet événement.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that could not be navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] pour le contenu cible n'ayant pas pu être accédé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the content that could not be navigated to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> du contenu cible n'ayant pas pu être accédé.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la requête Web utilisée pour accéder au contenu spécifié.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> object that was used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> utilisé pour effectuer une requête sur le contenu spécifié.

trans-unit.source: If navigating to an object, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Lors de la navigation vers un objet, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web request, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> est une classe de base abstraite qui encapsule une requête web, et n’est pas du protocole.

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> and extends it with protocol-specific state and behavior, including:
trans-unit.target: Pour chaque protocole commun, le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclut une classe qui dérive de <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> et les étend avec un état spécifique au protocole et le comportement, notamment :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `pack://` schéma de la requête de fichiers de données d’application (consultez [ressource d’Application WPF, contenu et les fichiers de données](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `http://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs Web.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `ftp://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs FTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `file://` schéma pour demander des fichiers locaux.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la réponse Web retournée à l'issue de la tentative de téléchargement du contenu demandé.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> retourné à l'issue de la tentative de téléchargement du contenu demandé.

trans-unit.source: If the navigation failed, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si la navigation a échoué, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web response, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> est une classe de base abstraite qui encapsule une réponse web, et n’est pas du protocole.

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> and extends it with protocol-specific state, including:
trans-unit.target: Pour chaque protocole commun, le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclut une classe qui dérive de <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> et les étend avec l’état spécifique au protocole, y compris :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `pack://` schéma de la requête de fichiers de données d’application (consultez [ressource d’Application WPF, contenu et les fichiers de données](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `http://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs Web.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `ftp://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs FTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `file://` schéma pour demander des fichiers locaux.
